description:
Best of both worlds.  Private, quiet clean apartment, in the center of a great neighborhood.  Easy access to transportation to Manhattan.  Very convenient.  My place is close to Fort Greene Park, Restaurants, Coffee Shops and All Shopping, BAM Harvey Theater, Near C, G, 4, 5, Q subways.  Good heating, unlimited hot water, treadmill, hard wood floors, 42" tv, wifi,  great location, great neighborhood, beautiful view. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Feel free to ask any questions.

Entire apartment.
name: Private Bright Studio with View of City
review:
The apartment was as exactly as described with a view of the Manhatten Skyline.
The neighbourhood is great with a lot of bars and restaurants around and several Metro lines within a few minutes walking distance.
The communication of our host was great and we felt well supplied with everything.
It was a great stay there.
